sentences.en: A contemplative discourse , usually on a religious or philosophical subject.
sentences.cn: 一些人在沉思中思考圣经中的语句.

sentences.en: All that afternoon he wore dreamy, contemplative appearance which in him was a mask of perplexity.
sentences.cn: 那天整个下午他都有着一幅如痴如梦, 心事重重的神色,这表明他对这一切迷惑不解.

sentences.en: Arrange smoking cessation advice in contemplative of reducing or stopping tobacco consumption.
sentences.cn: 为打算减少或停止烟草消耗吸烟者中提供戒烟建议.

sentences.en: Cedarquist looked after him with contemplative interest.
sentences.cn: 西达奎斯特若有所思地、满有兴味地冲着他的背影望望.

sentences.en: His attitude with regard to her, though it was contemplative and critical, was not judicial.
sentences.cn: 他对她的态度虽然是认真的,批判的但并不是明智的.

sentences.en: I went for long, contemplative walks by the river.
sentences.cn: 我沿着河走了很久，默默沉思着。

sentences.en: Life there is slow and contemplative.
sentences.cn: 那里的生活节奏舒缓，宜于沉思。

sentences.en: Martin is a quiet, contemplative sort of chap.
sentences.cn: 马丁是个不爱讲话、喜欢沉思默想的小伙子。

sentences.en: Mary has a quiet, contemplative nature.
sentences.cn: 玛丽性格文静, 好沉思默想.

sentences.en: On Vancouver Island a soaked beach reflects a contemplative evening ride.
sentences.cn: 在温哥华岛上湿润的海滩上,留下了一名陷入沉思的夜骑者的倒影.

sentences.en: The film's pacing is slow and its mood is contemplative.
sentences.cn: 电影的节奏缓慢,而气氛令人沉思.

sentences.en: This beauty is not an outward decorative sensation, rather an inward contemplative enduring state of being.
sentences.cn: 这种美,不是外在的装饰性的感觉, 而是内在的沉思性的持久存在.
我们不可能永远在沉思默想.

sentences.en: You are contemplative and analytical by nature.
sentences.cn: 思考与分析是你的天性.

words.tran_cn: 熟思的,爱默想的,冥想的

trans.tran_en: spending a lot of time thinking seriously and quietly
